title: Dyers Eve
lyrics:
Metallica
 Dyer`s Eve
 written by Hetfield and Ulrich
 as performed on ...And Justice For All
 tab by HypaDermic@aol.com
 
 
 Bass tablature for
 Dyer`s Eve - on the ...And Justice For All album
 Written by Metallica
 
 
 
 NOTE: The following tablature is very basic. It consists
 of a few riffs and where they go in the song. That`s it.
 You figure out the rest. I might do the rest myself, 
 later. During the guitar solo, the below riffs are 
 played, possibly on different octaves or scales at 
 times. This will at least give you an idea for the song.
 The riffs to the parts of the songs that I didn`t 
 transcribe are very close to the ones here, so they 
 shouldn`t be very hard to figure out.
 
 
 Intro:
 
 G--------------------------------------|
 D--------------------------------------|
 A|-2-3-2-3-2-3-2-3---------------------------------|
 E------0---1---0---3-0---1---0---0-1-0-|
 
 G-------------|
 D-------------|
 A---2-3-2-3---|
 E|-1---0---3-0----------0-|
 
 
 Riff 1:
               1,2,3,                   4,
 G----------------|
 D------------3-2-|
 A|-2h33333333-2-0h2-|-2h33333333-3-2-----|
 E----------------|
 
 
 
 Verse (Dear Mother, Dear Father):
 
 G---------------------------------------|
 D---------------------------------------|
 A|---------0-----32-------------0---------5------3-|
 E|-2---3-------0------2---3---0----3-2-0------3-----|
 
 
 At the end of Verses, there are often little Bridge 
 bars. Examples follow.
 
 G|
 D|
 A|
 E|-xxx-x-xxx-|
 
 G|
 D|
 A|
 E|-000-0-000-|
 
 G|--------|
 D|--------|
 A|---5-7--|
 E|--------|
